name: DeleteZoomMeetingSurvey
description:
Delete a scheduled Zoom meeting survey.

Use this tool to delete a survey associated with a scheduled Zoom meeting. Ensure the host is a Pro user with the Meeting Survey feature enabled. This tool is suitable for cases involving scheduled meetings, excluding instant meetings.

parameters.name: zoom_meeting_id
parameters.description: The ID of the scheduled Zoom meeting. Store as a long format integer due to its potential size exceeding 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
